Glebe House & Gallery

Historic home of renowned artist, Derek Hill, in Churchill, County Donegal

Welcome to Glebe House and Gallery

Glebe House, the home for nearly thirty years of the renowned artist Derek Hill, is situated on rising ground, beside Lough Gartan, east of Glenveagh National Park, Co. Donegal.

Originally known as St Columb’s, the 1828 Regency-style house is decorated with William Morris textiles, and collections of Islamic and Japanese art, as well as 300 works by leading twentieth-century artists such as Picasso and Kokoshka.

The house and gardens are displayed in an informal manner, as though Derek Hill was still in residence.

Glebe House and Gallery are operated and managed by the Office of Public Works.

Opening Times and Tours

Glebe House (only accessed by guided tour)
25th May to 3rd November 2019 (inclusive).
25th May to 30th September
11:00 to 18:30 (last admission 17:30).
1st October to 3rd November
11:00 to 17:30 (last admission 16:30).
Please note: In June, September, and October the House is closed on Fridays.
Glebe Gallery
The Gallery is open for Easter, from the 20th of April until the 28th of April 2019.
The Gallery opens for the summer season on 25th of May until 4th of November 2019.
11:00 to 18:30. (Early closing from 1st October – 17:30).
Please note: In June, September, and October the Gallery is closed on Fridays.

Ticket prices for the Glebe House tour are:

  • €5 (adult)
  • €4 (senior / group rate)
  • €3 (child / student)
  • €13 (family)

Free Admission with a Hertiage Card

Annual Hertiage Card costs:

  • €40 (adult)
  • €30 (senior / 60+)
  • €10 (student / child)
  • €90 (family)

Admission to the gallery is free.

School & Group Tours

Advance booking for groups of more than 8 people is required.

School Bookings

School visits are offered free of charge, however, advance booking is required. To arrange a school visit or to enquire about our workshops and other educational sessions, please use our contact form

Find out more about our education programme or see our education resource packs.

General Group Bookings

Please contact us via the contact form to enquire about group rates or to make a booking.

We offer special rates to tour operators for pre-booked tours (both guided and self-guided) for groups.
